Theme: R Packaging

Bytes & Bites is back! This time with a new host, the UBVU Research Software Engineer [Charlie Greene](https://vu.nl/en/about-vu/divisions/university-library/more-about/team-research-support), who will be taking over organising sessions from here on out.

This session of Bytes & Bites covers the topic of Reusability in software development and how using an R package over a project can increase it. We will cover how to make a package in R with an example project. Suitable for all levels!
